product_name: The North Face Meeks Jacket - Men's
long_description: Stay out longer doing the things you love wearing the fleece-lined hooded Meeks jacket from The North Face. It offers lightweight insulation with soft synthetic fibers. 80g Heatseeker(TM) insulation is the ideal amount of thermal protection for transitional weather when there's a chill in the air. The North Face Meeks jacket features an exterior that's treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light snowfall, sleet, or rain. Fixed cinch hood; hand pockets; flap chest pocket; hidden elastic cuffs; adjustable hem.
short_description: Stay out longer doing the things you love wearing the fleece-lined hooded Meeks jacket from The North Face. It offers lightweight insulation with soft synthetic fibers.
